title: Scattered photon compared to incident photon

content.prompt: A system initially consists of an electron and an incident photon. The electron and the photon collide, and afterward the system consists of the electron and a scattered photon. The electron gains kinetic energy as a result of this collision. Compared with the incident photon, the scattered photon has

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
